sentences.en: A darkroom can become a very sloppy place to work in.
sentences.cn: 暗室由于经常在里面工作,会变得非常潮湿.

sentences.en: A darkroom, as the name suggests, is a dark room used for developing photographs.
sentences.cn: 暗房, 顾名思义, 是作为冲洗照片的黑暗房间.

sentences.en: Articles cover color , darkroom operations , travel and nature photography , video making , camera equipment, and buying guides.
sentences.cn: 《大众摄影与图片》杂志是一本覆盖面很广的, 深度介绍摄影器材 、 摄影知识的杂志.

sentences.en: Darkined - room camera: A process camera the whole of which required to be placed indide the darkroom.
sentences.cn: 黑房相机: 要整部放于黑房内的制版照相机.

sentences.en: Darkroom Orientation . Will Cover Film and Print Developing.
Fear is that little darkroom where negatives are developed.
sentences.cn: 恐惧是培养消极心理的小暗房.

sentences.en: In biological experiments, especially during darkroom operation, slide glass is sometimes crashed by oil immersion objective.
sentences.cn: 在生物学实验中, 尤其在暗室操作时, 显微镜(以下所称显微镜均指光学显微镜)载玻片常被油镜镜头压碎.

sentences.en: In Chicago I took pictures of landmarks like the Water Tower and Lake Shore Drive, and after we got home I developed them in my darkroom (photography was another of my hobbies).
sentences.cn: 在芝加哥我拍摄了很多地标照片，诸如水塔和湖滨道，回家后我在暗房里把照片冲冼出来（摄影是我的另一项爱好）。

sentences.en: In the darkroom, Li would separate potentially dangerous negatives and hide them in his desk.
sentences.cn: 在暗房里, 李振盛把可能会带来危险的底片单独拿出来,藏在他的办公桌里.

sentences.en: No darkroom environment for long - term , stable job in an ordinary laboratory conditions.
sentences.cn: 无需暗室环境,可 长期 稳定工作在普通实验室条件下.

sentences.en: Round pattern on grassland and good composition add interest to this picture. Darkroom work is good.
sentences.cn: 构图及草地之图案增加这照片的趣味. 晒放功夫做得很好.

sentences.en: Shapes of flowers lack attraction. But darkroom work is very good.
sentences.cn: 花之形态欠缺吸引力, 但黑房晒放功夫做得非常好.

sentences.en: She thought of her humid, stuffy darkroom.
sentences.cn: 她想起了自己那间闷热潮湿的暗室.

sentences.en: Special effect can be achieved during conversion by using special screens or darkroom techniques.
sentences.cn: 在转换时,更可利用特别网片或黑房技巧,使相片有特别效果.

sentences.en: The key specification for darkroom electrical property is reflecting level.
sentences.cn: 暗室电性能的主要指标是反射率电平.

sentences.en: The lights are raised in the darkroom.
This experience, eerie at first, but now utterly familiar, has come to feel appropriate for a photographic adventure, like the adjustment of one's eyes, and perspective, upon entry into a darkroom.
sentences.cn: 这样的经历一开始让我觉得有点怪，不过现在却非常熟稔，这对我的摄影历险非常适合，类似于刚进入暗房时人的眼睛和视角要先适应一下。

sentences.en: Through controlling the each step in process of darkroom disposal, improve the quality of the sciagram efficently.
sentences.cn: 通过对暗室处理过程中各个环节的控制，有效提高射线底片的质量。

trans.tran_cn: （冲洗底片的）暗室，暗房，黑屋子
trans.tran_en: a special room with only red light or no light, where film from a camera is made into photographs
